resources.title: Adyen Payment Gateway
resources.storedPaymentHelpText: Allow shoppers to store payment method during checkout
resources.secretKeyHelpText: Provide any key which will be used to generate the authentication signature
resources.boletoDeliveryDateHelpText: Specify how many days the Boleto will be valid for payment
resources.boletoShopperStatementHelpText: Specify the text that will be show in the Boleto payment instructions. Use '\n\' to create a new line.
resources.originDomainHelpText: URL to use based on the /originKeys response. Defaults to current URL of the browser. Exact match.
resources.holderNameEnabledHelpText: When enabled, the shopper has to provide the card holder name
resources.countryCodeHelpText: Two letters country code where this shop is located. Required for some payment methods (i.e. installments)
